Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Relatore: Workshop on "Information in Pricing Models", University of Toulouse "P. Sabatier", Tolosa (Francia).
Relatore: Second Purdue Minisymposium on Financial Mathematics, Purdue University, Indiana (USA).
Relatore: 14th Workshop in Mathematics and Economics: Insider and Asymmetric Information in Financial Trading. Oslo University, Norvegia.
Relatore: Workshop "New Directions in Quantitative Finance", Paris.
Relatore: International Workshop: CREDIT RISK, Evry (Francia).
Relatore: 14th International Conference on Computing in Economics and Finance, University of Sorbonne (Paris).
Relatore: Summer School in Perceiving, measuring and managing risk: Illiquidity, long-term risk, natural resources, University of British Columbia (Vancouver), Canada.
Relatore: Journ ées MAS de la SMAI, Rennes (Francia).
Relatore: Istanbul Workshop on Mathematical Finance, Istanbul (Turchia). http://stats.lse.ac.uk/cetin/istanbulworkshop/index_istanbul.html
Relatore: Workshop on Foundations of Mathematical Finance, Fields Institute, Toronto (Canada).
Relatore: Conference in honour of Marc Yor 60th birthday, Paris.
Relatore: "Analysis, Stochastics, and Applications - A Conference in Honour of Walter Schachermayer", Vienna University (Austria).
Organizzazione: Workshop "Paris Dauphine : Markets with frictions", Parigi.
Relatore al "Workshop on Advanced Mathematical Methods for Finance", Berlino.
Relatore al workshop "Stochastic Analysis in Finance and Insurance", Oberwolfach, Germania.
Relatore al "JAROS Workshop and Young Researchers Workshop on Finance 2011", Tokyo Metropolitan University.
Relatore al "58th World Statistics Congress of the International Statistical Institute (ISI)", Dublino, Irlanda.
Relatore alla "International Conference on Stochastic Analysis and Applications", Hammamet (Tunisia).
Relatore alla "SIAM Conference on Financial Mathematics and Engineering", Minneapolis (USA).
Relatore alla "Joint Conference SMF-VMS", Hue University, Hue (Vietnam).
Relatore al "Seventh Bachelier Colloquium on Mathematical Finance and Stochastic Calculus", Metabief, Francia.
Relatore alla conferenza "Non-stationarity in Statistics and Risk Management", CIRM, Luminy, Francia.
Organizzazione: Minisymposium "M ethodes stochastiques en gestion des risques", SMAI Annual Conference 2013, Seignosse, Francia.
Relatore al workshop "Stochastic portfolio, arbitrage theory, role of information and credit risk", Beijing international center for mathematical research, Peking University, China.
Relatore al "Workshop on Electricity, Energy and Commodities Risk Management", Fields Institute, Toronto.

Organizzazione: Risk and Stochastics Conference 2014, London School of Economics, Londra. Web: http://www.lse.ac.uk/statistics/events/S pecialEventsandConferences/Risk-and-Stoc hastics-Conference-2014/Risk-and-Stochas tics-Conference-2014.aspx
Relatore al workshop "Mathematical Finance: Arbitrage and Portfolio Optimization", BIRS, Banff , Canada.
Relatore al workshop "Advances in stochastic analysis for risk modeling", CIRM, Marsiglia, Francia.
Organizzazione: "1st London-Paris Bachelier Workshop", Parigi. Web: https://sites.google.com/site/seminaireb achelierparis/bachelierseminarparislondo n
Relatore al "Paris - SEA Conference in Mathematical Finance", Siem Reap, Cambogia.

Organizzazione: Week on Kyle-Back Models (nell'ambito del "Semester on Information in Finance and Insurance", Parigi). Web: http://www.informationinfinanceandinsura nce.org/themes/kyle-back-equilibrium-mod els/
Relatore al "7th General AMaMeF and Swissquote Conference", Losanna.
Organizzazione: "2nd London-Paris Bachelier Workshop", King's College, Londra. Web: http://wwwf.imperial.ac.uk/~ajacquie/LondonParis2015/
Relatore al convegno "Frontiers in Stochastic Modelling for Finance", Università degli Studi di Padova.
Relatore al workshop "Stochastic Analysis and Mathematical Finance - A Fruitful Partnership", CMO, Oaxaca, Messico.
Relatore alla conferenza "Risks, uncertainty and models for Economy and Finance", Université du Maine, Le Mans, Francia.

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Insegnamento corso "Risk Measures" (in inglese) al "Master in Mathematics" (Università del Lussemburgo).

Insegnamento corso intensivo su "Pricing and hedging in energy markets" (in inglese) alla "Vietnamese-French Summer School on Mathematical Methods in Finance and Economics", University of Economics and Law e John Von Neumann Institute, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
